cause.description:
College classes irrelevant to students' majors should not be mandatory.
1. Some so-called "core" classes will never prove relevant to many students.
2. A student's time is precious.
3. A student's money is precious.
4. Besides social skills, few people find anything that they learn in high school useful later in life.
cause.mission: Our political objective is to have lifted requirements that mandate that students take any class irrelevant to their futures.
cause.name: Abolish Requirements That Students Take Classes Irrelevant to Their Futures
